message_1: Consider the Rail fence cipher with 3 rails which resulted in the encrypted message "HEOLWRDLOLLE". Using cryptanalysis techniques, determine the original message.
message_2:
To decrypt a Rail Fence cipher with 3 rails, we can reverse the encryption process. The encrypted message is "HEOLWRDLOLLE". We can arrange the letters in the following pattern:

H . . . O . . . L . . . L
. E . L . W . R . D . O .
. . O . . . L . . . E . .

Now, we can read the original message by following the zigzag pattern:

HELLO_WORLD

So, the original message is "HELLO WORLD".
